reference_a:
@article{merolla2024,
  title = {Responsiveness, social connection, hope, and life satisfaction in everyday social interaction: {{An}} experience sampling study},
  shorttitle = {Responsiveness, social connection, hope, and life satisfaction in everyday social interaction},
  author = {Merolla, Andy J. and Neubauer, Andreas B. and Otmar, Christopher D.},
  date = {2024-01-22},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Happiness Studies},
  shortjournal = {J Happiness Stud},
  volume = {25},
  number = {1},
  pages = {7},
  issn = {1573-7780},
  doi = {10.1007/s10902-024-00710-5}
}
topics: responsiveness, social connection, hope, life satisfaction
additional_comments: data collected as part of an intervention project

features.name: timestamp
features.coding: Timestamp in unix format with US/Pacific timezone

features.name: has_data
features.coding: Are data available for the timepoint? FALSE/TRUE

features.name: relationship_level
features.coding:
Nature of the participants' relationship to the person they were communicating with
1 = No established relationship/stranger
7 = established relationship

features.name: cared_for
features.coding:
If participants were in a social interaction in the last 10 min. of the survey signal: Asked for the degree to which their interaction partner made them feel cared for
1 = Not at all
5 = Extremely
Part of "Responsiveness" construct

features.name: respected
features.coding:
If participants were in a social interaction in the last 10 min. of the survey signal: Asked for the degree to which their interaction partner made them feel respected
1 = Not at all
5 = Extremely
Part of "Responsiveness" construct

features.name: supported
features.coding:
If participants were in a social interaction in the last 10 min. of the survey signal: Asked for the degree to which their interaction partner made them feel supported
1 = Not at all
5 = Extremely
Part of "Responsiveness" construct

features.name: connected
features.coding:
At this moment, how close and connected do you feel to other people?
1 = no connection
7 = a great deal of connection

features.name: interaction_type
features.coding:
Communication channel used for the interaction
Face-to-face, video calls, text messaging/SMS, voice-only phone calls, 0 (no interaction)
